title: Shadow Play
description: Sometimes getting out alive is the easy part.An hour ago, I had no clue vampires or werewolves were real. Now, my friends and I are being hunted. We just want to get out alive, but what kind of dark bargains will that require?Thereâ€™s only one person that I can trust to help us, but how can I justify putting her in this much danger?Something larger is at play here, but can I keep us from being sucked in?Shadow Play is the prequel novel to the Shadow Games series. If you like urban fantasy, mixed with thrilling action adventure and a hero with a wounded heart who may be out of his depth, but won't stop from doing the right thing, you'll love Shadow Play.
author: C.B.  Miller
